post:
What's up fellow LESbian family! 

We are cleaning up some of our old stock and figured, why not pass the savings to our community? Plus we need to make space for something else ;)

*What is our “Mega Deal Thursday?”*

>Every 1st Thursday of the month, we will post limited-time specials on our website, which will last till Sunday or till stock runs out.

**MGT-2G -Summer Cleanup- Germany**

>RAM: 2 GB
>Storage: 25 GB SSD
>Bandwidth: 4000 GB (@1Gbit)
>CPU Core:  3@3.5+ GHz (Fair Share - 1700x)
>IPv4: 1
>Free Blesta Billing Software
> or 
>Free windows server 2019 (with annual payment)
>Not eligible for switcher specials.
>No NAT Backup VPS.

**Plans are stackable.**

$48/year or $30/6 month

**[Click to place order.](https://nexusbytes.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=152 "Click to place order.")**

**FAQ :**
 
 * Location : *Falkenstein, Germany**
 * [Test IP and Download](https://nexusbytes.com/network.html)
 * [Don't be dick policy applies](https://nexusbytes.com/knowledgebase/2/Policies "Don't be dick policy applies")
 * Nested Virt Enabled
 * Custom ISO support
 * All codes and plans are recurring. You will be grandfathered in if we ever increase pricing.
 * Plan not transferable, not eligible for contract buyout/switcher. Only valid for new orders.
 * True 24/7 support. Average ticket **resolution time**: 1 hour. 
 * **Accepted Payment Methods:**
    * Debit/Credit Card
    * Paypal
    * Ali Pay
    * WeChat Pay
    * OXXO Mexico
    * Boleto Brazil
    * WebMoney
    * India NetBanking
    * Paytm
   *  Bitcoin / BitcoinCash / LiteCoin / Ethereum
